job_description:
• Life at Salesforce Our Locations Our Locations North America Europe, Middle East, and Africa Asia Pacific Latin America Our Teams Our Teams Sales Technology & Product Customer Success Corporate Roles AI Research University University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Talent Programs Talent Programs Overview Future Pathways India Return to Work Military Fellows Strong background in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Cyber Security or related disciplineMust be located in North AmericaBasic knowledge of security concepts based on relevant courses, self-learning or past internships.
• Relevant development experience in several of these languages: Java, JavaScript / NodeJS, Ruby,.
• Org Sustainability Investors Give us your Feedback Sitemap Legal Terms of Service Privacy Information Responsible Disclosure Trust Contact Manage Preferences Knowledge of force.
• Prior work experience in an application security role.
• University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager.
• Familiarity with identifying and protecting against web application and web service security vulnerabilities including those found in the OWASP Top 10 and CWE Top 25.
• NET, C / Objective C, PHP, Python.
• Familiarity with the browser security model, crypto, and network security.

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• The ideal candidate will have experience in Microchip firmware (MPLAB, Harmony), embedded Linux (ARM SoCs, Quartus), C++ GUI development with Qt, and networking (TCP/UDP).
• You'll translate customer needs into technical solutions and support project development end-to-end.
• Security clearance eligibility required (DoD preferred).
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• Software Engineer & Computer Science - Recent Grad/Full Time Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending As a Recent Graduate here at Honeywell, you will have the opportunity to kickstart your career by working alongside experienced professionals in a dynamic and innovative environment.
• Advanced Software Engr Locations Atlanta, GA, United States (Hybrid) Posting Date09/22/2025 Trending Software Engineer & Computer Science - Summer 2026 Intern (US Person Required) Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending Through hands-on learning experiences, global exposure, networking, and professional development opportunities, Honeywell interns will shape the future.
• You’ll have the opportunity to work alongside industry experts, lead initiatives that refine technical skills, and have unparalleled mentorship and growth opportunities that will elevate your career.

• Experience and certifications preferred.
